title: Hey T206 Collectors -- What are you looking for?
author: wazoo

posts.post_title: Hey T206 Collectors -- What are you looking for?
posts.post_content:
This is the identical thread I posted in the (T-card) section before there was a T206 only thread. I thought it would be a good idea to start it up again. 


Hey guys. I thought it would be a good idea to create a thread here where t206 collectors can post what they are looking for and hopefully find a match. It's basically a want list. There are previous threads like this, which worked really well, but are not used anymore. So let me start off. I am looking for:

    Hall of Famers (Basically any; SGC or PSA 2,3,4 condition please)
    Southern Leaguers (Basically any)
    Tough Commons (Ganley, Dahlen, etc.)
    Hindu Backs 

Just some ideas. Please, post your want list and hopefully we can find a match! Best regards.

Scrap....blank backs and scrap!!

great idea waz:)

PSA 4 or PSA 4.5 only.

Shag with an Old Mill back

Almost any HOFer in the following backs:

American Beauty (All)
EPDG
Sovereign 350 Apple
Cycle 460
Cycle 350
Brown Hindu
Tolstoi
Piedmont Factory 42

Any player in the following backs:

Broad Leaf 460
Uzit
Lenox
Red Hindu
Carolina Brights
Broad Leaf 350
Blank (any PSA grade)
Old Mill Brown (any PSA grade)

Hi Guys.  Looking for dark cap Matty's with any back for my run and always trying to upgrade.
   Also looking for Name at top cards with the top name being legible.
  Thanks, Doug Bacon
Perhaps looking for a PSA AUTH or 1 Lajoie (portrait or with bat)
Looking for T206 Dode Paskert with Cycle or Tolstoi backs (T213-1 and 3 Coupon variations as welll).
Looking for a high grade T206 Mike Powers Sweet Cap Factory 649 OP. Trade info [URL="http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=160835"]here.[/URL]

Raw/Graded of Carlton Molesworth and Luther "Dummy" Taylor with any backs.

Thanks for doing this :) It will make our BST life lil easier now-

Best,
Danny

Looking for one of the following cards with a Sweet Cap 350 (fact 30) back or a Polar Bear back or Piedmont 150 back:

Lajoie Bat
Young glove
Tinker portrait
I would like a low grade Magie or Plank, but not quite ready to make that run quite yet.

Any PSA 1 or 2

would like to get some and see how it goes from there.

sgc or psa mid grade (any back)

chase pink
chesbro
cicotte
schulte front view
[STRIKE]gandil[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]duffy[/STRIKE]
cobb green
cobb bat off 

any of the above cards in uncommon backs would be awesome!!!
Looking for Sovereign 350 backs in lower grades. Prefer lots but can definitely use singles as well!
